Instruction: Pat dry the chicken thighs with paper towels and place them in a roasting pan.
Halve the apricots and crush the garlic cloves.
Spread the halved apricots and crushed garlic around the chicken thighs in the roasting pan.
Drizzle olive oil over the chicken and apricots.
Sprinkle fresh rosemary leaves, salt, and black pepper over everything in the roasting pan.
Roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the apricots are caramelized.
Remove from the oven and let rest for a few minutes before serving.
Serve hot with your favorite side dishes.
